summary:
Bridging Made Easy via Layer Zero - Altitude’s vision is to enable Web3 users access to a seamless, single transaction process and promote cross-chain liquidity from one blockchain to another.

 Bridge - Easily migrate assets cross-chain

 Pool - Provide liquidity for your favorite assets on multiple chains. Zero impermanent loss.

 Farm - Earn ALTD by providing liquidity.

 Stake - Stake ALTD to participate in governance, while earning protocol fees and ALTD.
